relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is named a Customers' Choice in the 2023 Gartner® Peer Insights™ "Voice of the Customer": DDoS Mitigation Solutions
relatedBlades.copy:
Organizations must rise to the challenge of securing their entire environment, spanning their applications to their networks. Teams struggle to maintain security control over these siloed digital domains due to the complexity and cost of managing a patchwork of point tools, including those meant to protect against DDoS threats.

![All-vendors-are-classified-under-specific-quadrants-based-on-their-"overall-experience"-and-"user-interest-and-adoption-"--"Customers'-Choice"-quadrant-represents-the-highest-overall-experience-and-maximum-user](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/FZPV0zSGW1DAzss1fsGu8/529594db7ac965ad7bf00ed9824c35fa/All-vendors-are-classified-under-specific-quadrants-based-on-their-_overall-experience_-and-_user-interest-and-adoption-_--_.png)

Through 117 published reviews over an 18-month period ending on October 31, 2023, customers on Gartner Peer Insights have recognized Cloudflare as Customers' Choice for DDoS Mitigation Solutions. With this categorization, customers:

- Show a 94% willingness to recommend to others
- Rate product capabilities and deployment experience a 4.7 out of 5
- Gave Cloudflare 4.6 stars out of 5, one of the highest rated vendors included in the report

See why Cloudflare is placed in the Customers' Choice Quadrant. We believe our platform interoperability, threat intelligence, and network architecture helped contribute to our ranking. With Cloudflare, organizations have a simple path to securing everything and everyone, everywhere.

Read the full report for an overview of the DDoS mitigation market and the 7 included vendors.
